scripts.deploy:all: yarn deploy:rinkeby && yarn deploy:polygon && yarn deploy:mainnet && yarn deploy:arbitrumOne && yarn deploy:optimism
scripts.deploy:arbitrumOne: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:arbitrumOne && graph deploy --product hosted-service cryptoadong/spaymentArbitrumOne
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service cryptoadong/spaymentgoerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service cryptoadong/spaymentMainnet
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:optimism && graph deploy --product hosted-service cryptoadong/spaymentOptimism
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --product hosted-service cryptoadong/spaymentPolygon
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service cryptoadong/spaymentRinkeby
